parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become extremely stiff or difficult to maneuver, making it challenging to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning light illuminates
the steering wheel becomes stiff or difficult to turn
the vehicle drifts to one side
the steering wheel locks or becomes unresponsive
the vehicle is difficult to control or maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column to lock in place can cause the steering wheel to become unresponsive or difficult to control, making it challenging to operate the vehicle safely.
symptoms: The steering column does not lock in place
the steering wheel feels loose or unstable
the vehicle is difficult to control or maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the valve stem can cause sudden tire deflation, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential fatalities.
symptoms: The tire pressure monitoring system (TPMS) light illuminates
the tire valve stem breaks off
and the vehicle pulls to one side.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Uneven tire wear can lead to reduced traction, loss of control, and accidents, especially on high-speed roads.
Premature tire wear, uneven tire wear, and loss of vehicle control can lead to accidents, especially at high speeds.
Rear shock failure can cause loss of vehicle control, especially at high speeds, leading to accidents.
symptoms: premature wear of rear shock absorbers
and noise or vibration while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Design and manufacturing flaws can lead to premature wear and failure of components, causing safety issues and additional repair costs.
symptoms: Failure of rear seat rubber bushing
